Package net.minecraftforge.client.event

Klasse ScreenEvent.MouseButtonPressed

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
net.minecraftforge.client.event.ScreenEvent
net.minecraftforge.client.event.ScreenEvent.MouseInput
net.minecraftforge.client.event.ScreenEvent.MouseButtonPressed
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
ScreenEvent.MouseButtonPressed.Post, ScreenEvent.MouseButtonPressed.Pre
Umschließende Klasse:
ScreenEvent
public abstract static class ScreenEvent.MouseButtonPressed extends ScreenEvent.MouseInput
Fired when a mouse button is pressed. See the two subclasses for listening before and after the normal handling.
Siehe auch:
  • ScreenEvent.MouseButtonPressed.Pre

    Verschachtelte Klassen
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.MouseButtonPressed.Post
    Fired after the mouse click is handled, if the corresponding ScreenEvent.MouseButtonPressed.Pre was not cancelled.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.MouseButtonPressed.Pre
    Fired before the mouse click is handled by the screen.
